title: Amy’s Waiter ‘Passed Gas’ In Front Of Her + Celebrity Tattoo Artist 'Adam The Kid' On The Craziest Tattoo He’s Done + Parents Should Not Do This When Disciplining Their Kids
itunes:title: Amy’s Waiter ‘Passed Gas’ In Front Of Her + Celebrity Tattoo Artist 'Adam The Kid' On The Craziest Tattoo He’s Done + Parents Should Not Do This When Disciplining Their Kids
description:
Amy said she was at a coffee shop and her waiter farted. Her son heard it and called him out on it. Bobby’s tattoo artist, ‘Adam The Kid’ @adamthekid filled in for Lunchbox. He answered all of our questions about tattoos. Plus, Bobby gave an update on his dog Stanley. He turns 1 this weekend and his girlfriend wants to throw a birthday party for him! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
